org.cougaar.core.persist
Class FilePersistence

java.lang.Object
  org.cougaar.core.persist.PersistencePluginAdapter
      org.cougaar.core.persist.FilePersistenceBase
          org.cougaar.core.persist.FilePersistence
All Implemented Interfaces:
PersistencePlugin
public class FilePersistence
extends FilePersistenceBase

This PersistencePlugin saves and restores blackboard objects in files. There is one optional parameter naming the persistence root directory. If the parameter is omitted, the persistence root is specified by system properties.
